title: Nijigaku: Towards the Shuffle Festival! Part 1
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>We are now in an interview with Ayumu-san regarding the upcoming Shuffle Festival. Please tell us about your enthusiasm towards the Shuffle Festival, how you’re going to sing the song you’ve been assigned, and how you feel in general.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>T-, this is quite a serious interview, huh? I’m kind of nervous now....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I-, I’m sorry for being so stiff....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>No, no! Since you went and asked me properly, I’ll give a proper answer too! Umm, first of all, I’m really looking forward to the upcoming Shuffle Festival! Each of our first songs contains everything about us when we just started as school idols. To be able to sing such an important song makes me nervous, but also excited for it! I’ll work hard to make everyone feel “Ah, this song also sounds good when Ayumu sings it.”!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Fufu, that answer is very like you, Ayumu-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ehehe, though maybe it would be more interesting if I gave an unexpected answer....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Not at all! Your sincerity is one of your greatest points, Ayumu-san! Please stay that way! I, uh.... like you the way you are, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Thank you, Shioriko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>No, umm, I’m sorry to interrupt.... I’m also looking forward to it as it would give a fresh feel to familiar songs.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>There’s not much time before the live. Let’s do our best in practice, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
